rooms.description: Wheelchair-accessible entrance with wide doorways, low threshold, and ramps integrated into the design. Vastu-aligned entry facing North-East to invite positive energy.
An open, shaded courtyard providing natural light and ventilation. The design encourages communal gatherings with seating areas and water features in the middle to harmonize energy.
Tripartite open-plan space combining living room, dining area and kitchen. Vastu alignment suggests the south-east corner as a focal point for cooking, ensuring energy flows smoothly.
A separate bedroom with easy access to the living area. Designed for flexibility and privacy, ensuring clear pathways for wheelchair accessibility.

openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible door with smooth handles and ample clearance. Vastu alignment ensures it faces North-East.
Strategically placed to allow natural light while ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu principles by aligning with the energy flow.

rooms.description: A spacious, well-lit bedroom with a private balcony and en-suite bathroom. Vastu alignment suggests placement in the West or North-west to ensure restful energy.
Additional bedroom with easy access from the central corridor, designed for comfort and flexibility in spatial arrangement.
Additional bedroom with accessibility features, ensuring all corridors are wide enough for wheelchair passage.

openings.description: A broad, well-lit staircase with a wheelchair-accessible lift alternative. Designed with open railings for safety and aesthetic appeal.

rooms.description: A versatile bedroom, ensuring all pathways are free for wheelchair movement and providing views of the courtyard.
A secondary bedroom designed with ample natural light and ventilation. Vastu principles suggest a placement that balances the energy of the home.

openings.description: Continuation of a broad staircase, ensuring safety and accessibility with integrated lift for wheelchair access.

additional_design_elements.wheelchair_accessibility: All levels incorporate doorways at least 36 inches wide, ramps where necessary, and continuous clear pathways. Elevator is integrated in the design.
additional_design_elements.vastu_alignment: The triplex townhouse respects Vastu principles by aligning main entrance to the North-East, kitchen area in the South-East, master bedroom oriented towards the West or North-West, and ensuring balanced energy flow through open spaces.

plot_dimensions.description: A 50x80 feet plot accommodating the triplex design with a central courtyard.
